Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.listeners.ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageListenerSubscriber, Game, ProfessorChecker
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameModelTeams
public class GameModel extends ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber implements Game, ProfessorChecker
This class represents the game model.

    • initializeGame

      boolean initializeGame()
      Initializes the game by adding one student on each island except where there is mother nature and on the opposite island. Add the remaining student on the bag.
      Returns:
      if game is UNINITIALIZED or all players have entered.

    • executePlayAssistantCard

      boolean executePlayAssistantCard(AssistantCard assistantCard)
      Try to play an assistant card. If someone has already played it check that the current player hasn't other cards playable. Checks if the player had that card in hand and if it is the correct phase to play a card.
      Parameters:
      assistantCard - the card the player wants to play
      Returns:
      if the card was played successfully.

    • checkSomeoneHasPlayed

      private boolean checkSomeoneHasPlayed()
      This method check if someone has played an assistant card in the last round.
      Returns:
      true if someone has played an assistant card in the last round, false otherwise.

    • playAssistantCard

      public boolean playAssistantCard(AssistantCard assistantCard)
      Try to play an assistant card. If someone has already played it check that the current player hasn't other cards playable. Checks if the player had that card in hand and if it is the correct phase to play a card. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • executeMoveStudentToHall

      boolean executeMoveStudentToHall(int entranceIndex, ProfessorChecker professorChecker)
      Moves a student from the Entrance to the Hall of the current player if the player can play, the hall is not full and the index is valid. then proceeds to check if the professors need to be re-distributed between the players
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the student that will be moved to the Hall
      Returns:
      if the student was successfully moved to the hall.

    • moveStudentToHall

      public boolean moveStudentToHall(int entranceIndex)
      Moves a student from the Entrance to the Hall of the current player if the player can play, the hall is not full and the index is valid. then proceeds to check if the professors need to be re-distributed between the players Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToHall in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the student that will be moved to the Hall
      Returns:
      if the student was successfully moved to the hall.

    • executeMoveStudentToIsland

      boolean executeMoveStudentToIsland(int entranceIndex, int islandGroupIndex)
      Selects a student from the Entrance of the current Player's SchoolBoard, removes it from there and moves it to a selected island that is part of a selected IslandGroup. Checks if the player can play, if it is the correct game state and if the indexes are valid.
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the slot occupied by the student that will be moved
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup that contains the selected island
      Returns:
      if the student was moved successfully.

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public boolean moveStudentToIsland(int entranceIndex, int islandGroupIndex)
      Selects a student from the Entrance of the current Player's SchoolBoard, removes it from there and moves it to a selected island that is part of a selected IslandGroup. Checks if the player can play, if it is the correct game state and if the indexes are valid. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToIsland in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the slot occupied by the student that will be moved
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup that contains the selected island
      Returns:
      if the student was moved successfully.

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int num)
      Moves mother nature with a maximum movement of the number in the assistant card played. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveMotherNature in interface Game
      Parameters:
      num - of moves that MotherNature should make.
      Returns:
      if the move ended successfully.

    • moveMotherNature

      boolean moveMotherNature(int num, int maxNum, InfluenceChecker influenceChecker)
      Moves MotherNature of a selected number of moves, following the order of IslandGroups if the game phase is correct and the num is valid. If there are no clouds with students it skips the "choose cloud" phase.
      Parameters:
      num - of moves that MotherNature makes.
      Returns:
      if the move ended successfully.

    • atLeastOneCloudWithStudents

      boolean atLeastOneCloudWithStudents()
      Checks if at least one cloud has at least one student.
      Returns:
      if at least one cloud has at least one student.

    • executeGetStudentsFromCloud

      public boolean executeGetStudentsFromCloud(int cloudIndex)
      Moves the student currently residing on a cloud to the Entrance of the current Player if the game state and phase are correct, if the index is valid and if the cloud is not empty.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - of the selected cloud
      Returns:
      if the students were taken correctly from the cloud and added to the entrance.

    • getStudentsFromCloud

      public boolean getStudentsFromCloud(int cloudIndex)
      Moves the student currently residing on a cloud to the Entrance of the current Player if the game state and phase are correct, if the index is valid and if the cloud is not empty. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      getStudentsFromCloud in interface Game
      Parameters:

    • nextTurn

      void nextTurn()
      Starts the action phase of the next player. If it is the last players it ends the round.

    • checkProfessor

      public void checkProfessor(StudentColor s)
      the method checks that che professor of type s is assigned to the correct SchoolBoard and changes its position in case that the current assignment is incorrect
      Specified by:
      checkProfessor in interface ProfessorChecker
      Parameters:
      s - : the color of the professor to be checked

    • checkInfluence

      void checkInfluence(int islandGroupIndex)
      The method calculated the Influence that each Player has on a specific IslandGroup, selects the most influential Player and, in the casa that the Tower currently present on the IslandGroup is not the same one of the most influential Player, swaps the tower with the correct one, then proceeds to check whether the IslandGroup can be merged with the ones next to it. In order to calculate the influence of the various Players, the method calls an overloaded version of checkInfluence.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup in question

    • checkInfluence

      Tower checkInfluence(int islandGroupIndex, boolean skipTowers, int additionalInfluence, EnumSet<StudentColor> skipStudentColor)
      Overloaded version of checkInfluence that uses particular parameters to handel the effects of the CharacterCards. Groups players by tower color then finds the tower color that has the highest influence.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup on which the influence is calculated
      skipTowers - true in case that the CharacterCard "Centaur" is activated (during the turn the towers of the IslandGroup will not be counted for the computation on the influence)
      additionalInfluence - adds two extra points to the Player that has activated the CharacterCard of the Knight
      skipStudentColor - during the computation of the influence, the students of the colors decided by the Player that has activated the CharacterCard "Harvester" will not be counted
      Returns:
      the tower that belongs to the player/players with the most influence

    • findMaxInfluence

      private Tower findMaxInfluence(Map<Tower,Integer> influences)
      Find the tower with the max influence, in case of draw returns null
      Parameters:
      influences - a map that contains tower and its influence
      Returns:
      the tower related to the higher influence. Null if there is a draw or the tower doesn't exist

    • swapTowers

      void swapTowers(int islandGroupIndex, Tower newTower)
      the method is called after calculating the influence, whenever there is a change in the Player that holds the most influence on the IslandGroup; the method removes the current towers from the IslandGroup, puts them back on the SchoolBoard of the Player that they belong to, selects the current most influential Player and puts its towers on the islands. If the IslandGroup originally didn't have any tower, the first part of the method is skipped.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - index of the IslandGroup considered
      newTower - to be put on the IslandGroup

    • checkMergeIslandGroups

      int checkMergeIslandGroups(int islandGroupIndex)
      The method selects the IslandGroups that come before and after the one in the position islandGroupIndex and checks whether they can be merged. The method also handles the effects of the CharacterCard "Herbalist", which can put blocks on an IslandGroup to stop Players from positioning a Tower there: if the method is called on a blocked IslandGroup, the blocks need to be removed. If there are 3 or less island groups the game ends.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - of the islandGroup considered
      Returns:
      the number of blocks (prohibit cards) that need to be removed from the IslandGroup and put back on the "Herbalist" card

    • fixIslandGroupsIndexes

      private int fixIslandGroupsIndexes(int index, int next)
      fixes mother nature's index when two island groups are merged
      Parameters:
      index - of the first island group
      next - index of the next island group.
      Returns:
      new index of the merged island groups.

    • nextRound

      void nextRound()
      Advances the Game to the next round. If it is the last round it checks the winner.

    • refillClouds

      void refillClouds()
      Fills the clouds by getting the students from the bag. If there are no more students this will be the last round.

    • calculateWinners

      void calculateWinners()
      Calculates winners by finding who build the most towers. If equal, who has the most professors. If still equal then there is a draw.
